column3: utACK but looks like your are using functions not available in the libevent version travis compiles against (evhttp_request_error) https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/159869918#L1081\n
Somehow I was afraid of that, all of the useful stuff in libevent is in the alpha/beta branch these days... deja vu to #7759.\n

I've guarded the uses of evhttp error with `LIBEVENT_VERSION_NUMBER >= 0x02010300`. This is the version it was introduced in according to git history. On older versions it will always print unknown error.\n
Ok I've slightly tweaked the error messages and rebased. This should be ready to go.\n
